page.title: 18Living in Charvil.
page.content: I live down Milestone Avenue in Charvil near St Patricks stream and opposite some of the farm fields.In the spring the fields have a strong smell of manure. In summer it is very warm and the smell of manure has mostly gone away and the smell of flowers has come.Mum usually sun bathes in summer, dad does the gardening ,Julian sprays himself with a hose and I go and play with my friend. In autumn the leaves go red, yellow and a lightish brown then fall of as usual.We like to play in them. In winter it is very good because when the road ices up we go tobogganing down the hill and when it snows we make massive snowmen in the garden.
